I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.
I miss my motorcycle and wish I could still have it, but I'm happy with my car.

i am 5 3 an love movie time.
I'm a weirdo who loves to swim in the lake.

I go for a walk in the park to clear my head and to enjoy the sunshine.

content.text: Hi!
Hi!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go for walks, swim in the lake, and watch movies.
Nice! I love to go for walks too, and I love to take my golden retriever puppy to the park to play fetch.
That sounds like fun! I've never had a dog before, but I've always wanted one.
I love my dog, but he can be a handful sometimes.
I'm sure he's worth it!
He is! He's the best friend I could ask for.
I'm glad you're so happy with him.
Thanks! What's your favorite movie?
I don't have a favorite movie, but I do love the Lord of the Rings trilogy.
That's a good choice! I've seen all of those movies, and they're definitely some of my favorites too.
I love the fantasy aspect of them, and I think the acting is really good.
I agree! I'm also a big fan of the Harry Potter movies.
I've seen those too, and I like them a lot.
What's your favorite thing to do in the park?
I like to go for walks, and I also like to pick wildflowers.
I love picking wildflowers too! They're so beautiful.
I agree! I also like to go swimming in the lake.
That sounds like fun! I've never been swimming in a lake before.
You should try it sometime! It's really refreshing.
I will! I'm sure I'd love it.
I'm glad! I love swimming
